gov.nih.nlm.ling.core

Class SynDependency

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.ling.core.SynDependency
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Edge, java.lang.Comparable<SynDependency>

    public class SynDependency
extends java.lang.Object
implements Edge, java.lang.Comparable<SynDependency>
    Represents a syntactic dependency between two textual units. Syntactic dependencies are generally assumed to be between two tokens, but here that notion is generalized, so dependencies can be between longer textual units. A syntactic dependency consists of an identifier, a type (the name of the dependency), a governor and a dependent, both of which are textual units. Examples of dependency types include noun compound (nn), adjectival modifier (amod), etc.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

      • SEMANTICS_ORDER

        public static final java.util.Comparator<SynDependency> SEMANTICS_ORDER
        Order a set of dependencies based on their semantics of the textual units involved. Those textual units that have associated predicates are considered to be higher-level and are given precedence. This allows a bottom-up predicate-argument structure extraction (hopefully). Another reason this is done is to make processing of syntactic dependencies deterministic. Otherwise, different behavior may be observed depending on the order these are processed.

      • SynDependency

        public SynDependency(nu.xom.Element el,
                     java.util.Map<java.lang.String,Word> wordIdMap)
        Creates a SynDependency from internal XML representation. The XML element is expected to have the attributes: id, type, t1, and t2. t1, t2 are the identifiers for the words.
        Parameters:
        el - the XML element
        wordIdMap - a map that contains words and their ids

                                                         java.util.List<SynDependency> dependencies)
        Finds all dependencies that involve a given textual unit.
        Parameters:
        se - the textual unit whose dependencies are being searched for
        dependencies - the dependency list to search for
        Returns:
        the list of dependencies that involve the textual unit, or empty list if no dependencies

      • dependenciesWithType

        public static java.util.List<SynDependency> dependenciesWithType(SurfaceElement se,
                                                                 java.util.List<SynDependency> dependencies,
                                                                 java.lang.String type,
                                                                 boolean exactMatch)
        Finds all dependencies with a certain type that involve a given textual unit. Approximate type matching is allowed. For example, setting the type to "prep" and exactMatch to false, all prepositional dependencies will be retrieved, including "prep_in", "prep_to", "prep_of", etc.
        Parameters:
        se - the textual unit whose dependencies are being searched for
        dependencies - the dependency list to search for
        type - the dependency type to search for
        exactMatch - whether to do exact match on the type name
        Returns:
        the list of dependencies that involve the textual unit, or empty list if no such dependency

      • dependenciesWithTypes

        public static java.util.List<SynDependency> dependenciesWithTypes(SurfaceElement se,
                                                                  java.util.List<SynDependency> dependencies,
                                                                  java.util.List<java.lang.String> types,
                                                                  boolean exactMatch)
        Similar to dependenciesWithType(SurfaceElement, List, String, boolean), except this method uses a list of dependency types, instead of a single type.
        Parameters:
        se - the textual unit whose dependencies are being searched for
        dependencies - the dependency list to search for
        types - the dependency types to search for
        exactMatch - whether to do exact match on the type name
        Returns:
        the list of dependencies that involve the textual unit, or empty list if no such dependency

      • findDependencyPath

        public static java.util.List<SynDependency> findDependencyPath(java.util.List<SynDependency> dependencies,
                                                               SurfaceElement start,
                                                               SurfaceElement goal,
                                                               boolean directed)
        Recursively finds the dependency path between two textual units. The chain can be one-directional or the direction may be ignored.
        Parameters:
        dependencies - the dependency list to inspect
        start - the first textual unit
        goal - the second textual unit
        directed - whether the search is unidirectional (true if so)
        Returns:
        the list of dependencies that form the path between these textual unit, null if no path is found

      • findDependenciesBetween

        public static java.util.List<SynDependency> findDependenciesBetween(java.util.List<SynDependency> dependencies,
                                                                    SurfaceElement surf1,
                                                                    SurfaceElement surf2,
                                                                    boolean directed)
        Finds all direct dependencies between two textual units (path length of 1).
        Parameters:
        dependencies - the list of all dependencies to consider
        surf1 - the first textual unit
        surf2 - the second textual unit
        directed - whether direction of the dependency should be considered
        Returns:
        the list of direct dependencies between surf1 and surf2

      • getAllGovernors

        public static java.util.LinkedHashSet<SurfaceElement> getAllGovernors(java.util.List<SynDependency> deps)
        Gets all the governing textual units in a given collection of dependencies.
        Parameters:
        deps - the list of dependencies
        Returns:
        the set of all governors

      • getAllDependents

        public static java.util.LinkedHashSet<SurfaceElement> getAllDependents(java.util.List<SynDependency> deps)
        Returns all the dependent textual units in a given collection of dependencies.
        Parameters:
        deps - the list of dependencies
        Returns:
        the set of all dependents

      • getPredecessors

        public static java.util.LinkedHashSet<SurfaceElement> getPredecessors(SurfaceElement su,
                                                                      java.util.List<SynDependency> deps)
        Returns all the predecessors of a textual unit using a list of dependencies. A predecessor is a textual unit that dominates the other textual unit.
        Parameters:
        su - a textual unit
        deps - the list of dependencies
        Returns:
        the set of all predecessors to su

      • getSuccessors

        public static java.util.LinkedHashSet<SurfaceElement> getSuccessors(SurfaceElement su,
                                                                    java.util.List<SynDependency> deps)
        Returns all the successors of a textual unit using a list of dependencies. A successor is a textual unit that is dominated by the other textual unit.
        Parameters:
        su - a textual unit
        deps - the list of dependencies
        Returns:
        the set of all successors to su

      • getCommonAncestor

        public static SurfaceElement getCommonAncestor(java.util.List<SynDependency> deps,
                                               java.util.List<SurfaceElement> surfs)
        Finds the common ancestor of a list of textual units in the dependency graph. It currently only considers a single level up from the textual units.
        Parameters:
        deps - the dependencies in the graph
        surfs - the list of textual units
        Returns:
        the common ancestor if any, null otherwise

      • getSubtreeDependenciesWithTypes

        public static void getSubtreeDependenciesWithTypes(java.util.List<SynDependency> dependencies,
                                                   SurfaceElement surf,
                                                   java.util.List<java.lang.String> depTypes,
                                                   java.util.List<SynDependency> withTypes,
                                                   java.util.List<SynDependency> others)
        Finds all out-dependencies with given types from a node or one of its descendants. withTypes list contains syntactic dependencies with one of the given types, and others contains dependencies with other types.
        Parameters:
        dependencies - the dependencies to check
        surf - the textual unit whose descendants to search
        depTypes - dependency types to consider
        withTypes - dependencies with the types
        others - dependencies with other types

      • removeDependencies

        public static java.util.List<SynDependency> removeDependencies(java.util.List<SynDependency> dependencies,
                                                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> depTypes)
        Removes dependencies of particular types from a list of dependencies.
        Parameters:
        dependencies - the dependencies to consider
        depTypes - dependency types to remove
        Returns:
        dependency list without the undesired dependencies, empty list if the input is null
